thread.title: CHARLENE B. ANNEN
thread.title_full: Israelblessing reviewed by CHARLENE B. ANNEN

author: CHARLENE B. ANNEN
title: CHARLENE B. ANNEN
text: I love my Ani Ledodi Vedodi Li Pendant. It is beautiful and hasn't tarnished at all unlike some of my other silver jewelry. The Israel Blessings website is easy to navigate and the pieces are nicely displayed so that you know what you are purchasing.
